name: TheAtlantic
text: In this week’s Dear Therapist, @LoriGottlieb1 advises a reader who is contemplating whether and how he should save his parents’ marriage. https://t.co/2aPsXBq0o8

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @JeffreyGoldberg: "Talking with economists, climate scientists, and psychologists convinced me that depersonalizing climate change, such that the only answers are systemic, is a mistake of its own." Smart piece from @AnnieLowrey:
https://t.co/bQiPTVedTF

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @AdrienneLaF: "What I took away from my five or six days on a film set with Bannon was a feeling of his destructive impulses. His is not an ideology of making things; it is an ideology of pure destruction." @errolmorris's latest: https://t.co/WPAPDD948D

name: TheAtlantic
text: COVID-19 vaccines can be tested in monkeys, but U.S. researchers don't have enough, and China has shut off exports. @sarahzhang reports: https://t.co/TcJ5bR0mSn
